title: Got Meat from Muslim family, can we eat without knowing their Aqeedah? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: when we get meat as a gift from a muslim family but we do not know their akrida can we eat it that says yes definitely as long as there is no reason to doubt you just say bismillah the hadith states that the companions ask the prophet about people close to them who have recently accepted islam and they offered them food and they don't know whether they had mentioned the name of allah or not the prophet said you say bismillah and that's sufficient
